summary: Microsoft Outlook is a popular software tool that helps people manage their emails, calendar, tasks, and contacts. It's part of the Microsoft 365 package and is used by many businesses. Outlook can also be used for taking notes, web browsing, and reading news. Individuals can use it on their own, or companies can set it up so that multiple people can share and collaborate on emails, calendars, and documents. There are different versions of Outlook for Windows and Mac, and there are also free web and mobile apps with similar names.
title: Microsoft Outlook
